StoryElement.StoryElement: [An hour has passed and still Robby and Ai are waiting for Junko. The fridge is now half empty.]
This girl can drink! I’ve had a few but I’ve lost count of how many she’s had.
[Ai stands up and tries make her way to the toilet.]
ROBBY: You’re a great dancer.
AI: I’m not dancing I’m trying to find my way to the toilet.

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: AI: That’s OK, I got it.

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: Whoa, watch out! I gotcha.
AI: Thanks for catching me.
ROBBY: My pleasure.
AI: You must be rich.
ROBBY: Why do you say that?
AI: You can pay for all this alcohol.
ROBBY: Are you kidding? This is complementary, right?
AI: You thought this was free?

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: Of course not. I can pay for it.
What! Stop drinking now. Put these bottles back!

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: AI: Oh good, you must be able to read Japanese!
AI: You didn’t read this sign?
AI: Oh, I see it’s written in English.
AI: But it’s written in English too. “All items removed will be included in your bill at checkout.”

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: I know I’ll tell Mariko. We’ve known each other for all of . . . three hours. No, Junko can talk to her. Where is she?
AI: I don’t know but it’s bath time. Are you coming?
ROBBY: Sure.
AI: Take off your clothes.
ROBBY: OK.
AI: Not here! Go in the bathroom and put on one of these. It’s a yukata. Here! I’ll see you later!
ROBBY: See you . . .
[Robby surveys the damage of the room. Empty one liter beer bottles and snack bags lay open everywhere.]
ROBBY: . . . after I clean this place up.
[Robby stand in front of the bath sign and stops. He takes out the piece of paper that Mariko gave him. He stares at is for a bit.

Which one was it? I should have written it down. I’m such an idiot. I’ll try this one. OK, so far so good. This must be the locker room. Wait a minute what I do? I must take off my clothes here and go to the bath naked. Wait a minute! That’s crazy, I can’t just walk in naked and “hey everyone look at what I got” . . . I’ll just keep my swimming trunks on.
[Robby enters the bath area slowly and cautiously.]

No one’s here. This place is unreal. It’s like that grotto at the Playboy Mansion. Wait a minute I hear someone talking. It’s coming from behind that rock. I’ll just slip in on this side. Holy Christmas, this water is hot! Uh oh there are girls in here! Oh, I see this side of the rock must be the men’s side and that other side is the women’s. Wow, they’re really trusting here. How am I not supposed to spy on these lovely ladies? Oh, shoot! Is that Junko? And who’s that other girl?
JUNKO: Yes, he’s really cute.
OTHER GIRL: Are you sharing a room with him?
JUNKO: Yes, Mariko put us in the same room. It’s the only way we could afford to stay here.
[The two girls laugh.]
OTHER GIRL: What about tonight? What if he’s crazy or a pervert?
JUNKO: He’s not! But I might be.
[A thrashing in the water is heard. The other girls look to where Robby is hiding.]
Oh, snap! I better make a run for it.
[The girls scream.]
JUNKO: Look at that man he’s wearing a bathing suit!
OTHER GIRL: Eeew gross!
I think they saw me! Uh oh more women in the locker.
[Women in locker room scream.]
ROBBY: Sorry! At least I know what that Japanese sign means now.
